title: Motivational Strategies in Multimedia Learning: Facilitating Generative Processing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience using learning tools
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning environment designed to strengthen workplace-integrated learning for practitioners. Flexible learning support tailored to individual pace and context

learning_goals: Learners can identify motivational elements (visual appeal, challenging scenarios, etc.) in multimedia materials and apply them to generative processing
Learners can design learning content utilizing motivational strategies while minimizing cognitive load and distractions
Learners can diagnose their motivation levels and derive improvement strategies based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
